Translations.Text: Dang tamen ba ta dai zou, bingqie yizhi jueding ba ta touru jing di de shihou, wo qishi ta shuo:“Jianglai ni biding yao ba tamen de zhe jian shi, zai tamen buzhi bu jue de shihou, gaosu tamen.”
Bangwan, tamen kuzhe lai jian tamen de fuqin
tamen shuo:“Women de fuqin a! Women saipao shi, shi you su fu liushou xingli, buliao lang ba ta chile. Ni shi jue bu hui xiangxin women de, jishi women shuo de shi shihua.”

Tamen yong jia xue ranle you su fu de chenyi, na lai gei tamen de fuqin kan. Ta shuo:“Buran, nimen de siyu songyong nimen ganle zhe jian shi; wo zhiyou hen hao de rennai, dui nimen suo xushu de shi, wo zhi neng qiuzhu yu an la!”
Lukemen laile, tamen pai ren qu ji shui, ta ba shuitong zhui xiajing qu, ta shuo:“A! Hao xiaoxi! Zhe shi yige shaonian.” Tamen mimi de ba ta dang zuo huowu, an la shi quanzhi tamen de xingwei de
Tamen yi lianjia——ke shu de ji ge yinbi——mai diaole ta, tamen shi bu lianxi ta de

Na goumai ta de aiji ren dui ziji de qizi shuo:“Ni yingdang youdai ta, ta yexu dui women you haochu, huozhe women fuyang ta zuo yi zi.” Wo zheyang shi you su fu zai da dishang huode diwei, yibian wo jiao ta yuanmeng. An la duiyu qi shiwu shi zizhu de, dan renmen daban bu zhidao
Dang dadao zhuangnian shi, wo ba zhihui he xueshi shangci ta, wo zheyang baochou xingshan zhe
